title: Ryou Kataomoi Overkill!
alternative_title: Ryou Kataomoi Overkill! ; Ryoukataomoi Overkill! ; 両片思いオーバーキル！ ; 双向单相思杀伤力太高了！
status: Ryou Kataomoi Overkill! ; Ryoukataomoi Overkill! ; 両片思いオーバーキル！ ; 双向单相思杀伤力太高了！
description:
Description :
        At the rival schools of Serigaku and Serijou, Akimi, a dull and serious boy, and Benio, a beauty with spectacular grades, are chosen to organize a joint festival. As they collaborate, a deep love emerges between them. However, both are descendants of past student council presidents, whose relationship caused conflict between the schools. 

Now, Akimi and Benio will have to defy their destiny as they fight for their unrequited love under the shadow of their past. As presidents of the executive committee, they have a mission to bring their schools back together through the festival. Can these two young people transform the destiny of their schools and make their love transcend the confines of rivalry?
